intro: Pterotropia gymnocarpa, commonly known as the smooth-seeded pterotropia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its distinctive, palmate leaves and showy, yellowish flowers. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
